Description: Cake that includes shredded carrots and often buttercream icing on the top
Cake that includes coco powder to make a chocolaty flavor.
Cake that has vanilla essence in it so as that it has that flavor. This is considered a basic flavour.
A combanation of different flavor cake batters, often only 2 or 3 flavors. They are lightly mixed together to create a marble pattern.
Includes lemon curd in the middle of a vinilla and poppy seed cake.
